mapper.select: SELECT IDX, MENU_ID, TITLE, WRITER, READCOUNT, ( SELECT COUNT(FILE_NUM) FROM FILES F WHERE F.IDX = B.IDX ) FILESCOUNT, TO_CHAR(REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') REGDATE, BNUM, LVL, STEP, NREF FROM BOARD B WHERE MENU_ID = #{ menu_id } ORDER BY NREF DESC, STEP ASC
SELECT IDX, MENU_ID, TITLE, CONT, WRITER, TO_CHAR(REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') REGDATE, READCOUNT, BNUM, LVL, STEP, NREF FROM BOARD WHERE IDX = #{ idx }
SELECT FILE_NUM, IDX, FILENAME, FILEEXT, SFILENAME FROM FILES WHERE IDX = #{ idx }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( IDX , MENU_ID , TITLE , CONT , WRITER , REGDATE , READCOUNT , BNUM , LVL , STEP , NREF ) VALUES ( ( SELECT NVL(MAX(IDX),0)+1 FROM BOARD) , #{ menu_id } , #{ title } , #{ cont } , #{ writer } , SYSDATE , 0 , ( SELECT NVL(MAX(BNUM),0)+1 FROM BOARD) , 0 , 0 , ( SELECT NVL(MAX(NREF),0)+1 FROM BOARD) )

INSERT INTO BOARD ( IDX , MENU_ID , TITLE , CONT , WRITER , REGDATE , READCOUNT , BNUM , LVL , STEP , NREF ) VALUES ( ( SELECT NVL(MAX(IDX),0)+1 FROM BOARD) , #{ menu_id } , #{ title } , #{ cont } , #{ writer } , SYSDATE , 0 , #{ bnum } , #{ lvl } + 1 , #{ step } + 1 , #{ nref } )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BOARD WHERE IDX = #{ idx }
DELETE FROM FILES WHERE IDX = #{ idx }
